official_title: A bill to authorize any bank holding company to acquire control of banks and any national bank to establish branches throughout the federal judicial circuit in which such bank holding company or national bank is located.

summary.text: Authorizes a national bank to establish branches throughout the Federal judicial circuit in which it is located, subject to express authorization by State law. Amends the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to permit a bank holding company to acquire banks throughout the Federal judicial circuit in which it is located.

titles.title: A bill to authorize any bank holding company to acquire control of banks and any national bank to establish branches throughout the federal judicial circuit in which such bank holding company or national bank is located.
